name: ExoTanks MOBA
detailed_description:
ExoTanks is a fast-paced MOBA Shooter based on tank battles of the future.
Mars, 2090. Two factions, the Confederation and the Syndicate, are fighting for power over the red planet and its resources.
You’ll have to master combat vehicles. Each tank has unique abilities, including an ultimate one.
The appearance of each tank is exclusive. Сreate an individual appearance with camouflage and stickers of different rarity!
Each combat vehicle has individual characteristics, as well as its own type of chassis and weapons, which makes the movement and firing mechanics different for each tank.
This is a MOBA game, which means that you’ll have to upgrade your tank during battle! Gaining experience and increasing your tank’s rank, you can choose various combinations of equipment in each battle. The team’s success depends on the interaction of the tanks of three different classes: Defender, Assault, and Engineer. The tank class determines not only the tank’s role in battle but also the nature of its abilities, as well as the pros and cons of its characteristics.
ExoTanks MOBA is a peculiar combination of tank shooter and MOBA game. The spirit of rivalry, cooperating with brothers in arms, and epic tank battles on the vast areas of Mars in the Sci-Fi world — that’s what makes a real dynamic MOBA shooter.
Repetitive and continuous shooting from ambush does not bring joy anymore? Then stop hiding in the bushes! Сhoose a tank suitable for you and go full throttle.
It’s time to bring real Armageddon to the battlefield of the future!

short_description: A fast-paced Sci-Fi MOBA Shooter game based on tank warfare on the vast areas of planet Mars! Master unique tanks, each having particular abilities, mechanics, and appearance. Upgrade your tank during the battle. Immerse yourself in the Sci-Fi world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 7 64-bit / Windows® 8 64-bit / Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500 @3.3 GHz / AMD AMD Phenom II X6 1055T
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 / AMD Radeon™ HD 7850 ( 2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050TI (4 ГБ) / Radeon RX 570 (4 ГБ)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
